General.Name: Arabian Centres Co
General.Description: Arabian Centres Company develops, owns, and operates lifestyle shopping centers in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company also builds, leases, and sells buildings; and constructs commercial buildings, as well as provides demolition, repair, excavation, and maintenance works. In addition, it is involved in the maintenance and operation of commercial centers, tourist resorts, hotels, and restaurants; and managing and operating temporary and permanent exhibitions, compounds, and hospitals. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
